Installed capacity of the hydro power plant before the implementation of the project activity.

Discussion and verification assessment Purpose of data Calculation of project emissions Verified value (e) Source of value Registered VCS-PD /05/ Justification Project is a new hydro power plant which has been verified from various documents /10/, /12/, /19/, /21/, /22/. For new hydro power plants, this value is zero. The value has been correctly taken as per the registered VCS-PD /05/ and Hence accepted by the verification team.

6. Ast (m2)
